e3_demo:advancements.e3_demo.heavy_heart: Capture 20 bashers in a single run of the original mansion on hard difficulty
e3_demo:advancements.e3_demo.root.descri: Advancements part of the E3 Demo add-on
e3_demo:advancements.e3_demo.unlock_orig: A mansion that follows the E3 demo
e3_demo:dialog.e_gadd_call.2: Looks like you got a vacuum full of ghosts there.
e3_demo:dialog.e_gadd_call.2.more: Looks like you got vacuums full of ghosts there.
e3_demo:dialog.just_money.1: You've done well in the original mansion, %s my boy!
e3_demo:dialog.just_money.1.more: You've done well in the original mansion, kiddos!
e3_demo:dialog.just_money.2: The mansion seems to have disappeared into the night, but the treasure seems to be real. I have no interest in such stuff, so go on and keep it all! Use it however you like!
e3_demo:dialog.just_money.2.more: The mansion seems to have disappeared into the night, but the treasure seems to be real. I have no interest in such stuff, so go on and keep it all! Use it however you like!
e3_demo:dialog.just_money.3: Perhaps you could buy me an assistant. Heh heh heh!
e3_demo:dialog.just_money.3.more: Perhaps you could buy me an assistant. Heh heh heh!
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.10: Whoa! There's no time for chit-chat!
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.11.more: Come, youngsters! Follow me, for now!
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.4: ...What are you doing walking into people's houses like this? What nerve!
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.4.more: ...What are you doing walking into people's houses like this? What nerve!
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.5: Huh? You own this mansion? You say your name is %s? Well, I've never heard of you...
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.5.more: Huh? You own this mansion? Those are your names? Well, I've never heard of you...
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.6: ...Who? Me? I'm professor Elvin Gadd, the ghost researcher.
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.7: I thought this was a secret house, so I've been living here for some time, I do apologize!
e3_demo:dialog.meet_e_gadd.8: This is a famous haunted house, so it's perfect for my research. Please excuse me.
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.1: You've done well in the original mansion, %s my boy!
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.1.more: You've done well in the original mansion, kiddos!
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.2: The mansion seems to have disappeared into the night, but the treasure seems to be real. I have no interest in such stuff, so go on and keep it all! Use it however you like!
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.2.more: The mansion seems to have disappeared into the night, but the treasure seems to be real. I have no interest in such stuff, so go on and keep it all! Use it however you like!
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.3: It looks like you caught some of the escaped portrait ghosts.
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.3.more: It looks like you caught some of the escaped portrait ghosts.
e3_demo:dialog.portrificationize.4.more: Let's take care of them, kiddos!
e3_demo:dialog.underground_lab.change_am: Prevents ghosts from escaping the Poltergust because of mistakes.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.bat: A bat that will attack if you get too close. It comes in many colors.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.bas: A fanged ghost who likes to sneak up behind its pray and scare your hat off.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.bod: A big-nosed ghost who makes painful shock waves by striking the floor from above.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.mou: A ghost mouse that wanders around. It comes in many colors.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.gho: A fanged ghost who likes to throw spinning punches.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.fly: A small ghost that hangs out in a small area with a group.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.pun: A big-nosed ghost who uses uppercuts to hurt foes.
e3_demo:message.gallery.small_ghosts.shi: A ghost who bounces around rooms. It comes in many colors.
Clear all clearable rooms in the original mansion before E. Gadd calls.
e3_demo:message.gallery.trophy.cant_touc: Get no damage in the original mansion until E. Gadd calls.
e3_demo:message.gallery.trophy.ghost_cas: Get a total of 1.500 ghost coins.
e3_demo:message.gallery.trophy.hone_skil: Do the portrait battles of all ghosts in the original mansion.
e3_demo:message.gallery.trophy.more_mone: Get 400 ghost coins in the original mansion before E. Gadd calls.
e3_demo:message.gallery.trophy.portrait_: Capture Neville and Lydia in the original mansion before E. Gadd calls.
Clear a room, only to get 1 coin from the chest in the original mansion.
e3_demo:message.gallery.trophy.teasing.d: Scan Miss. Petunia in the original mansion.
e3_demo:message.no_mansion_inside_found: No inside of the mansion was found! Make sure you dragged in the dimension files and closed the world after installing the data pack.
